question_sentence: Which network is taking Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night talk show off the air indefinitely?
evidence: Disney’s ABC is taking Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night talk show off the air indefinitely amid a controversy over his recent comments about Charlie Kirk’s suspected killer.

question_sentence: President Donald Trump met with Prime Minister Keir Starmer this week as part of his second state visit to which country?
evidence: President Trump and first lady Melania Trump traveled to the UK for a historic second state visit.

question_sentence: Which ice cream brand announced that its co-founder has quit the company?
evidence: Ben & Jerry’s co-founder Jerry Greenfield quit the ice cream brand he started in 1978 amid a dispute with its British owner Unilever.

question_sentence: Pilots reported a laser targeting multiple commercial flights in Boston this week. What color was the laser?
evidence: The FAA is investigating reports of a "green laser" that targeted planes flying near Boston Logan International Airport on Monday.

question_sentence: The desert-centric Coachella music festival announced its 2026 lineup this week. Where does the annual concert take place?
evidence: Music lovers will flock to California’s Coachella Valley for the massive festival in April 2026.

question_sentence: Which tech giant unveiled AI-powered smart glasses this week?
evidence: Mark Zuckerberg unveiled Meta’s newest AI-powered smart glasses on Wednesday. The glasses have a tiny display screen inside the lens that only the wearer can see, among other interesting features.

question_sentence: Which city may soon see the arrival of federal law enforcement as part of President Trump’s latest crime crackdown?
evidence: President Trump announced Monday that he will soon send federal law enforcement to Memphis. The deployment is part of Trump’s broader effort to expand his anti-crime push nationwide.

question_sentence: Which award show recently took place in Los Angeles?
evidence: The 77th Primetime Emmy Awards, honoring the best in American television, were broadcast live from Los Angeles on Sunday. See the full list of winners.

question_sentence: The Israeli military launched a massive ground offensive this week in which city?
evidence: Israel said it launched an expanded ground assault on Gaza City on Tuesday in defiance of international condemnation, as Palestinians fled the enclave’s largest urban area in waves.

question_sentence: President Trump has filed a $15 billion lawsuit against which newspaper?
evidence: President Donald Trump filed a $15 billion lawsuit against The New York Times, alleging defamation.
